summary: This bill, the Codifying Useful Regulatory Definitions Act (CURD Act), aims to define "natural cheese" within the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act. It provides a specific definition, outlining production methods and ingredients allowed, and excludes various processed cheese products. Furthermore, it regulates the use of the term "natural cheese" on food labels, ensuring accuracy for consumers. The bill also updates existing sections of the law related to labeling inconsistencies.
